T002.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to fetch information about the Mahindra XUV 3XO's safety and performance specifications, and then merge it with the data from the previous step (T001). I will use the web search tool to find relevant information. I will focus on ADAS features, airbags, braking systems for safety, and engine specs, horsepower, torque, transmission, and mileage for performance. Finally, I will combine the results from the web search with the output from task T001.

code.CODE_1:
safety_results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO safety features ADAS airbags braking systems', 8)
performance_results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO engine horsepower torque transmission mileage', 8)
previous_data = inputs.get('T001', {})
output = {'safety': safety_results, 'performance': performance_results, 'previous_data': previous_data}

safety.text: [{'url': 'https://ackodrive.com/car-guide/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-explained/', 'content': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: Your Complete Guide HOME BUY NEW CAR BLOG Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Team Spinny Last updated 3 months ago As we all know the safety of a vehicle is one of the most important attributes in current times. People want a car that not only delivers on performance and efficiency but also stands out with its safety features. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is making headlines as one of the safest small SUVs in India. This beast by Mahindra has gained attention for its advanced features and design, which are further complemented with its safety features. It is an upgraded version of the Mahindra XUV300 that packs a strong punch. The starting price of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is Rs. 7.99 lakh (ex-showroom), making it an affordable yet well-equipped compact SUV. The safety of a vehicle is best measured through crash test ratings, and Mahindra has ensured that the XUV 3XO meets high standards. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating proves that it is one of the safest cars in its segment. Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP Safety Rating Checking a cars NCAP rating is one of the best ways to understand how safe it is. NCAP, or the New Car Assessment Program, conducts crash tests to see how well a vehicle can protect its occupants in an accident. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has performed well in its NCAP tests. It was tested under Bharat NCAP (BNCAP), which is Indias version of the global safety program. The Mahindra XUV 3XO received a 5-star safety rating in Bharat NCAP, meaning it provides excellent protection for both adults and children. Lets look at the details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP rating. Mahindra XUV 3XO Adult Occupant Protection Rating During the adult occupants rating in the NCAP test, the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP ratings were pretty impressive. The vehicle scored the maximum possible score of 29.36 out of 32 points . Some crucial factors that contributed to this high rating include: Stable Bodyshell: The structure of the Mahindra XUV 3XO has been found to be stable, meaning it can withstand additional impact without collapsing. Frontal Impact Protection: The cars front airbags and seatbelt pre-tensioners helped reduce injuries to the head, neck, and chest. Side Impact Protection: The side structure of the XUV 3XO, along with additional side and curtain airbags, ensured safety in side collisions. Electronic Stability Control (ESC): This system helps maintain control of the car during sudden turns or slippery conditions, reducing the chances of rollovers. All-Wheel Disc Brakes: The XUV 3XO offers disc brakes on all four wheels, providing better braking efficiency. Mahindra XUV 3XO Child Occupant Protection Rating Child safety is another critical aspect of a cars overall safety rating. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating for child occupants is 43 out of 49 points , which is an excellent score. This means the car provides solid protection for children in case of an accident. Some of the key factors that contributed to this rating include: ISOFIX Child Seat Anchors: These allow parents to securely install child safety seats, reducing the risk of movement in case of impact. Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque May 1, 2024, 11:58 AM IST By Prathu Sharma 0 This article will give you a perspective of the engine specs like, displacement, power, torque, mileage and transmission details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol and diesel engines. Considering the body style, size and price range of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it competes with the following cars: Kia Sonet Maruti Suzuki Fronx Renault Kiger NIssan Magnite Hyundai Venue Tata Nexon What Are The Engine Specs Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | ENGINE SPECS Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Displacement 1197cc 1197cc 1497cc Cylinder 3 3 4 Power 110PS @ 5000rpm 130PS @ 5000rpm 117PS @ 3750rpm Torque 200Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 230Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 300Nm @ 1500 - 2500rpm Manual 6-speed MT 6-speed MT 6-speed MT Automatic 6-speed TC 6-speed TC 6-speed AMT The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available with 3 engine options: two 1.2L turbo petrol engines and a 1.5L turbo diesel engine. One of the 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 110PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 130PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is also available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine churns out 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500 and 2500rpm. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed AMT automatic transmission. What Is The Mileage Or Fuel Efficiency Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | MILEAGE OR FUEL EFFICIENCY Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Manual FE 20.10kmpl 18.89kmpl 20.60kmpl Automatic FE 18.20kmpl 17.96kmpl 21.20kmpl The Mahindra XUV 3XOs lower tuned 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a mileage of 20.10kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.20kmpl with the 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a claimed mileage of 18.89kmpl with the manual transmission and 17.96kmpl with the TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine has a mileage of 20.60kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 21.20kmpl with the 6-speed AMT transmission. 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Team Spinny Last updated 3 months ago As we all know the safety of a vehicle is one of the most important attributes in current times. People want a car that not only delivers on performance and efficiency but also stands out with its safety features. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is making headlines as one of the safest small SUVs in India. This beast by Mahindra has gained attention for its advanced features and design, which are further complemented with its safety features. It is an upgraded version of the Mahindra XUV300 that packs a strong punch. The starting price of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is Rs. 7.99 lakh (ex-showroom), making it an affordable yet well-equipped compact SUV. The safety of a vehicle is best measured through crash test ratings, and Mahindra has ensured that the XUV 3XO meets high standards. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating proves that it is one of the safest cars in its segment. Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP Safety Rating Checking a cars NCAP rating is one of the best ways to understand how safe it is. NCAP, or the New Car Assessment Program, conducts crash tests to see how well a vehicle can protect its occupants in an accident. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has performed well in its NCAP tests. It was tested under Bharat NCAP (BNCAP), which is Indias version of the global safety program. The Mahindra XUV 3XO received a 5-star safety rating in Bharat NCAP, meaning it provides excellent protection for both adults and children. Lets look at the details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP rating. Mahindra XUV 3XO Adult Occupant Protection Rating During the adult occupants rating in the NCAP test, the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP ratings were pretty impressive. The vehicle scored the maximum possible score of 29.36 out of 32 points . Some crucial factors that contributed to this high rating include: Stable Bodyshell: The structure of the Mahindra XUV 3XO has been found to be stable, meaning it can withstand additional impact without collapsing. Frontal Impact Protection: The cars front airbags and seatbelt pre-tensioners helped reduce injuries to the head, neck, and chest. Side Impact Protection: The side structure of the XUV 3XO, along with additional side and curtain airbags, ensured safety in side collisions. Electronic Stability Control (ESC): This system helps maintain control of the car during sudden turns or slippery conditions, reducing the chances of rollovers. All-Wheel Disc Brakes: The XUV 3XO offers disc brakes on all four wheels, providing better braking efficiency. Mahindra XUV 3XO Child Occupant Protection Rating Child safety is another critical aspect of a cars overall safety rating. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating for child occupants is 43 out of 49 points , which is an excellent score. This means the car provides solid protection for children in case of an accident. Some of the key factors that contributed to this rating include: ISOFIX Child Seat Anchors: These allow parents to securely install child safety seats, reducing the risk of movement in case of impact. Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque May 1, 2024, 11:58 AM IST By Prathu Sharma 0 This article will give you a perspective of the engine specs like, displacement, power, torque, mileage and transmission details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol and diesel engines. Considering the body style, size and price range of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it competes with the following cars: Kia Sonet Maruti Suzuki Fronx Renault Kiger NIssan Magnite Hyundai Venue Tata Nexon What Are The Engine Specs Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | ENGINE SPECS Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Displacement 1197cc 1197cc 1497cc Cylinder 3 3 4 Power 110PS @ 5000rpm 130PS @ 5000rpm 117PS @ 3750rpm Torque 200Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 230Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 300Nm @ 1500 - 2500rpm Manual 6-speed MT 6-speed MT 6-speed MT Automatic 6-speed TC 6-speed TC 6-speed AMT The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available with 3 engine options: two 1.2L turbo petrol engines and a 1.5L turbo diesel engine. One of the 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 110PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 130PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is also available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine churns out 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500 and 2500rpm. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed AMT automatic transmission. What Is The Mileage Or Fuel Efficiency Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | MILEAGE OR FUEL EFFICIENCY Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Manual FE 20.10kmpl 18.89kmpl 20.60kmpl Automatic FE 18.20kmpl 17.96kmpl 21.20kmpl The Mahindra XUV 3XOs lower tuned 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a mileage of 20.10kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.20kmpl with the 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a claimed mileage of 18.89kmpl with the manual transmission and 17.96kmpl with the TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine has a mileage of 20.60kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 21.20kmpl with the 6-speed AMT transmission. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. nodes.description: Fetch initial set of features for Mahindra XUV 3XO from the web, focusing on exterior and interior design.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch detailed information about the exterior and interior design features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO from reliable automotive websites and compile them into a structured format. Include details like dimensions, materials used, seating capacity, and any unique design elements.

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to find detailed information about the Mahindra XUV 3XO's exterior and interior design features. I'll use the web search tool to find reliable automotive websites and extract the relevant information. Since the prompt asks for details like dimensions, materials, seating capacity, and unique design elements, I'll craft search queries that focus on those aspects.

code.CODE_1:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO exterior design features dimensions materials', 8)
output = {'exterior': results}
code.CODE_2:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO interior design features seating capacity materials', 6)
output = {'interior': results}
code.CODE_3:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO unique design elements features', 5)
output = {'unique_features': results}

nodes.description: Fetch details about safety features and performance specifications for Mahindra XUV 3XO, and merge with T001 output.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch information about the safety features (ADAS, airbags, braking systems, etc.) and performance specifications (engine, horsepower, torque, transmission, mileage) of the Mahindra XUV 3XO from reliable automotive websites. Merge this information with the output from task T001 and output in a single, consolidated output.

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to fetch information about the Mahindra XUV 3XO's safety and performance specifications, and then merge it with the data from the previous step (T001). I will use the web search tool to find relevant information. I will focus on ADAS features, airbags, braking systems for safety, and engine specs, horsepower, torque, transmission, and mileage for performance. Finally, I will combine the results from the web search with the output from task T001.

code.CODE_1:
safety_results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO safety features ADAS airbags braking systems', 8)
performance_results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO engine horsepower torque transmission mileage', 8)
previous_data = inputs.get('T001', {})
output = {'safety': safety_results, 'performance': performance_results, 'previous_data': previous_data}

Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Team Spinny Last updated 3 months ago As we all know the safety of a vehicle is one of the most important attributes in current times. People want a car that not only delivers on performance and efficiency but also stands out with its safety features. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is making headlines as one of the safest small SUVs in India. This beast by Mahindra has gained attention for its advanced features and design, which are further complemented with its safety features. It is an upgraded version of the Mahindra XUV300 that packs a strong punch. The starting price of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is Rs. 7.99 lakh (ex-showroom), making it an affordable yet well-equipped compact SUV. The safety of a vehicle is best measured through crash test ratings, and Mahindra has ensured that the XUV 3XO meets high standards. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating proves that it is one of the safest cars in its segment. Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP Safety Rating Checking a cars NCAP rating is one of the best ways to understand how safe it is. NCAP, or the New Car Assessment Program, conducts crash tests to see how well a vehicle can protect its occupants in an accident. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has performed well in its NCAP tests. It was tested under Bharat NCAP (BNCAP), which is Indias version of the global safety program. The Mahindra XUV 3XO received a 5-star safety rating in Bharat NCAP, meaning it provides excellent protection for both adults and children. Lets look at the details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP rating. Mahindra XUV 3XO Adult Occupant Protection Rating During the adult occupants rating in the NCAP test, the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP ratings were pretty impressive. The vehicle scored the maximum possible score of 29.36 out of 32 points . Some crucial factors that contributed to this high rating include: Stable Bodyshell: The structure of the Mahindra XUV 3XO has been found to be stable, meaning it can withstand additional impact without collapsing. Frontal Impact Protection: The cars front airbags and seatbelt pre-tensioners helped reduce injuries to the head, neck, and chest. Side Impact Protection: The side structure of the XUV 3XO, along with additional side and curtain airbags, ensured safety in side collisions. Electronic Stability Control (ESC): This system helps maintain control of the car during sudden turns or slippery conditions, reducing the chances of rollovers. All-Wheel Disc Brakes: The XUV 3XO offers disc brakes on all four wheels, providing better braking efficiency. Mahindra XUV 3XO Child Occupant Protection Rating Child safety is another critical aspect of a cars overall safety rating. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating for child occupants is 43 out of 49 points , which is an excellent score. This means the car provides solid protection for children in case of an accident. Some of the key factors that contributed to this rating include: ISOFIX Child Seat Anchors: These allow parents to securely install child safety seats, reducing the risk of movement in case of impact. Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque May 1, 2024, 11:58 AM IST By Prathu Sharma 0 This article will give you a perspective of the engine specs like, displacement, power, torque, mileage and transmission details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol and diesel engines. Considering the body style, size and price range of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it competes with the following cars: Kia Sonet Maruti Suzuki Fronx Renault Kiger NIssan Magnite Hyundai Venue Tata Nexon What Are The Engine Specs Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | ENGINE SPECS Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Displacement 1197cc 1197cc 1497cc Cylinder 3 3 4 Power 110PS @ 5000rpm 130PS @ 5000rpm 117PS @ 3750rpm Torque 200Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 230Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 300Nm @ 1500 - 2500rpm Manual 6-speed MT 6-speed MT 6-speed MT Automatic 6-speed TC 6-speed TC 6-speed AMT The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available with 3 engine options: two 1.2L turbo petrol engines and a 1.5L turbo diesel engine. One of the 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 110PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 130PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is also available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine churns out 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500 and 2500rpm. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed AMT automatic transmission. What Is The Mileage Or Fuel Efficiency Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | MILEAGE OR FUEL EFFICIENCY Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Manual FE 20.10kmpl 18.89kmpl 20.60kmpl Automatic FE 18.20kmpl 17.96kmpl 21.20kmpl The Mahindra XUV 3XOs lower tuned 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a mileage of 20.10kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.20kmpl with the 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a claimed mileage of 18.89kmpl with the manual transmission and 17.96kmpl with the TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine has a mileage of 20.60kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 21.20kmpl with the 6-speed AMT transmission. 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. safety.text: [{'url': 'https://ackodrive.com/car-guide/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-explained/', 'content': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: Your Complete Guide HOME BUY NEW CAR BLOG Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Team Spinny Last updated 3 months ago As we all know the safety of a vehicle is one of the most important attributes in current times. People want a car that not only delivers on performance and efficiency but also stands out with its safety features. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is making headlines as one of the safest small SUVs in India. This beast by Mahindra has gained attention for its advanced features and design, which are further complemented with its safety features. It is an upgraded version of the Mahindra XUV300 that packs a strong punch. The starting price of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is Rs. 7.99 lakh (ex-showroom), making it an affordable yet well-equipped compact SUV. The safety of a vehicle is best measured through crash test ratings, and Mahindra has ensured that the XUV 3XO meets high standards. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating proves that it is one of the safest cars in its segment. Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP Safety Rating Checking a cars NCAP rating is one of the best ways to understand how safe it is. NCAP, or the New Car Assessment Program, conducts crash tests to see how well a vehicle can protect its occupants in an accident. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has performed well in its NCAP tests. It was tested under Bharat NCAP (BNCAP), which is Indias version of the global safety program. The Mahindra XUV 3XO received a 5-star safety rating in Bharat NCAP, meaning it provides excellent protection for both adults and children. Lets look at the details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP rating. Mahindra XUV 3XO Adult Occupant Protection Rating During the adult occupants rating in the NCAP test, the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP ratings were pretty impressive. The vehicle scored the maximum possible score of 29.36 out of 32 points . Some crucial factors that contributed to this high rating include: Stable Bodyshell: The structure of the Mahindra XUV 3XO has been found to be stable, meaning it can withstand additional impact without collapsing. Frontal Impact Protection: The cars front airbags and seatbelt pre-tensioners helped reduce injuries to the head, neck, and chest. Side Impact Protection: The side structure of the XUV 3XO, along with additional side and curtain airbags, ensured safety in side collisions. Electronic Stability Control (ESC): This system helps maintain control of the car during sudden turns or slippery conditions, reducing the chances of rollovers. All-Wheel Disc Brakes: The XUV 3XO offers disc brakes on all four wheels, providing better braking efficiency. Mahindra XUV 3XO Child Occupant Protection Rating Child safety is another critical aspect of a cars overall safety rating. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating for child occupants is 43 out of 49 points , which is an excellent score. This means the car provides solid protection for children in case of an accident. Some of the key factors that contributed to this rating include: ISOFIX Child Seat Anchors: These allow parents to securely install child safety seats, reducing the risk of movement in case of impact. Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque May 1, 2024, 11:58 AM IST By Prathu Sharma 0 This article will give you a perspective of the engine specs like, displacement, power, torque, mileage and transmission details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol and diesel engines. Considering the body style, size and price range of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it competes with the following cars: Kia Sonet Maruti Suzuki Fronx Renault Kiger NIssan Magnite Hyundai Venue Tata Nexon What Are The Engine Specs Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | ENGINE SPECS Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Displacement 1197cc 1197cc 1497cc Cylinder 3 3 4 Power 110PS @ 5000rpm 130PS @ 5000rpm 117PS @ 3750rpm Torque 200Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 230Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 300Nm @ 1500 - 2500rpm Manual 6-speed MT 6-speed MT 6-speed MT Automatic 6-speed TC 6-speed TC 6-speed AMT The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available with 3 engine options: two 1.2L turbo petrol engines and a 1.5L turbo diesel engine. One of the 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 110PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 130PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is also available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine churns out 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500 and 2500rpm. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed AMT automatic transmission. What Is The Mileage Or Fuel Efficiency Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | MILEAGE OR FUEL EFFICIENCY Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Manual FE 20.10kmpl 18.89kmpl 20.60kmpl Automatic FE 18.20kmpl 17.96kmpl 21.20kmpl The Mahindra XUV 3XOs lower tuned 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a mileage of 20.10kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.20kmpl with the 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a claimed mileage of 18.89kmpl with the manual transmission and 17.96kmpl with the TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine has a mileage of 20.60kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 21.20kmpl with the 6-speed AMT transmission. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Moreover, with the ADRENOX Connect technology, you can control your cars features through your smartphone from the comfort of your home. It allows y', 'images': [{'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'alt_text': 'image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}, {'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/Mahindra_XUV_3_XO_1_50764da01b.png', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra', 'width': '740', 'height': '400', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-amc-Library/default/dw14bf6b46/X3XO/XUV3XOProductBrochure-01-07-24.pdf', 'content': "[error] 'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 195-196: character maps to <undefined>", 'rank': 2}, {'url': 'https://automotivemahindra.com/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-variants-explained/', 'content': 'Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO | Automotive Mahindra Skip to main content Sales:6309432323 Service:6309666592 Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search XUV 3XO Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO By admin May 30, 2024 December 30th, 2024 No Comments Home BLOG Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO All Variants Explained Bookings for the Mahindra XUV 3XO began on May 15 in India, while deliveries got initiated from May 26. Not only does the Compact SUV come with Everything You Want & More, but it also has a significantly updated look. Since the Mahindra XUV 300s powertrain configuration is the same as that of the small SUV, there are no changes to its technical specifications. The SUVs front profile appears more forceful thanks to its redesigned radiator grille, new projector headlights, and inverted LED daytime running lights. The Hyundai Venue, Maruti Suzuki Brezza, and Tata Nexon are among the best-selling cars in the segment that the car will go up against. Pay a minimum of Rs 21,000* at the Automotive showrooms like Mahindra 3XO Showroom in Hyderabad to book the compact SUV now. The fact that the official statistics show an astounding 50,000 BOOKINGS IN 60 MINUTES is exciting. Ex-showroom, the SUVs price ranges from Rs 7.48* Lakh to Rs 15.49* Lakh. Overview of Top Features This car is amazing with its 10.25-inch infotainment system and driver display, digital instrument cluster, ambient lighting, wireless charging, dual-zone climate control, Adrenox, ventilated front seats, and powered driver seats. It also has a 360-degree surround camera. Along with Apple CarPlay, a Type-C charging port, wireless Android Auto setup, and many other car connection features, it also has these features. Level-2 ADAS, panoramic sunroof category first introduced with the Mahindra 3XO. Also, theres a replacement of the XUV300 Variants with the labels MX and AX in 3XO. The major upgrades in Mahindra XUV 3XO are set to make the driving experience, comfort, safety, and technology more advanced. Safety There are six airbags as standard on all models of car. It also has a rear disc brake, an ISOFIX anchor, and electronic stability control. A level 2 advanced driver assistance system is among the safety systems that are included with the top 3XO model. A 360-degree camera, hill-start assistance, blind spot monitoring, and an electronic parking brake with auto hold are among the other safety features. Talk to the expert staff of Automotive Mahindra Dealers Hyderabad to know more information on safety. Engine There are three different engine options available for the vehicle. A 1.5-liter diesel engine with 115 horsepower is produced. A 1.2-liter gasoline engine with turbocharging generates 110 horsepower, while another 1.2-liter engine with turbocharging generates 129 horsepower. Additionally, a 6-speed manual or automatic transmission is an option with this. The XUV 3XO boasts a wide variety of premium turbo engines designed for exhilarating performance and outstanding efficiency. In keeping with the brands tradition of delivering thrilling performance, the mStallion TGDi and Turbo Diesel engines produce best-in-class power and torque of 96 kW (130 PS) & 230 Nm and 85.8 kW (117 PS) & 300 Nm, respectively. The mStallion TGDi can accelerate from 0 to 60 km/h in 4.5 seconds and has a segment-best fuel efficiency of 20.1 km/l* with a manual gearbox. A 6-speed AISIN 3rd Gen Automatic Transmission, which is well-known for its dependability and durability, powers the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This is proved by the fact that it was effectively adopted by the XUV 700, which also utilizes a transmission from the same family. Together with seamless gear changes, the transmission is tuned to deliver exceptional fuel economy and a fun to drive experience. Blending cutting-edge technology with sleek design, this latest addition to the XUV series promises to revolutionize the driving experience for consumers worldwide. Design Elegance: The 2026 XUV 3XO boasts a futuristic exterior design that seamlessly merges aerodynamics with aesthetic appeal. With its bold lines, aggressive stance, and distinctive grille, the XUV 3XO commands attention on the road. LED headlights and taillights further enhance its modern look, while sleek contours contribute to improved fuel efficiency. Performance Prowess: Under the hood, the XUV 3XO is powered by an advanced hybrid powertrain that delivers impressive performance while minimizing environmental impact. Equipped with state-of-the-art electric motors and a responsive combustion engine, this crossover SUV offers exhilarating acceleration and dynamic handling, making every journey a thrill. Tech-Savvy Features: Step inside the cabin, and youll find yourself immersed in a world of innovation. The 2026 XUV 3XO comes loaded with an array of cutting-edge features designed to enhance comfort, convenience, and connectivity. From a high-definition touchscreen infotainment system to advanced driver-assistance technologies, every aspect of the driving experience has been meticulously crafted to cater to the needs of modern motorists. Safety First: Mahindra prioritizes safety, and the XUV 3XO is no exception. Equipped with an array of intelligent safety features such as adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and autonomous emergency braking, this crossover SUV provides peace of mind for both drivers and passengers alike. Additionally, a robust chassis and advanced airbag system ensure maximum protection in the event of a collision. Sustainability Focus: In an era where environmental conservation is paramount, the 2026 XUV 3XO leads the charge towards a greener future. With its hybrid powertrain and eco-friendly materials, this vehicle minimizes carbon emissions without compromising performance. Mahindras commitment to sustainability is evident in every aspect of the XUV 3XO, from its efficient engineering to its recyclable components. Conclusion: With the launch of the 2026 XUV 3XO, Mahindra once again demonstrates its unwavering dedication to innovation, performance, and sustainability. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Team Spinny Last updated 3 months ago As we all know the safety of a vehicle is one of the most important attributes in current times. People want a car that not only delivers on performance and efficiency but also stands out with its safety features. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is making headlines as one of the safest small SUVs in India. This beast by Mahindra has gained attention for its advanced features and design, which are further complemented with its safety features. It is an upgraded version of the Mahindra XUV300 that packs a strong punch. The starting price of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is Rs. 7.99 lakh (ex-showroom), making it an affordable yet well-equipped compact SUV. The safety of a vehicle is best measured through crash test ratings, and Mahindra has ensured that the XUV 3XO meets high standards. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating proves that it is one of the safest cars in its segment. Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP Safety Rating Checking a cars NCAP rating is one of the best ways to understand how safe it is. NCAP, or the New Car Assessment Program, conducts crash tests to see how well a vehicle can protect its occupants in an accident. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has performed well in its NCAP tests. It was tested under Bharat NCAP (BNCAP), which is Indias version of the global safety program. The Mahindra XUV 3XO received a 5-star safety rating in Bharat NCAP, meaning it provides excellent protection for both adults and children. Lets look at the details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP rating. Mahindra XUV 3XO Adult Occupant Protection Rating During the adult occupants rating in the NCAP test, the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP ratings were pretty impressive. The vehicle scored the maximum possible score of 29.36 out of 32 points . Some crucial factors that contributed to this high rating include: Stable Bodyshell: The structure of the Mahindra XUV 3XO has been found to be stable, meaning it can withstand additional impact without collapsing. Frontal Impact Protection: The cars front airbags and seatbelt pre-tensioners helped reduce injuries to the head, neck, and chest. Side Impact Protection: The side structure of the XUV 3XO, along with additional side and curtain airbags, ensured safety in side collisions. Electronic Stability Control (ESC): This system helps maintain control of the car during sudden turns or slippery conditions, reducing the chances of rollovers. All-Wheel Disc Brakes: The XUV 3XO offers disc brakes on all four wheels, providing better braking efficiency. Mahindra XUV 3XO Child Occupant Protection Rating Child safety is another critical aspect of a cars overall safety rating. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating for child occupants is 43 out of 49 points , which is an excellent score. This means the car provides solid protection for children in case of an accident. Some of the key factors that contributed to this rating include: ISOFIX Child Seat Anchors: These allow parents to securely install child safety seats, reducing the risk of movement in case of impact. Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque May 1, 2024, 11:58 AM IST By Prathu Sharma 0 This article will give you a perspective of the engine specs like, displacement, power, torque, mileage and transmission details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol and diesel engines. Considering the body style, size and price range of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it competes with the following cars: Kia Sonet Maruti Suzuki Fronx Renault Kiger NIssan Magnite Hyundai Venue Tata Nexon What Are The Engine Specs Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | ENGINE SPECS Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Displacement 1197cc 1197cc 1497cc Cylinder 3 3 4 Power 110PS @ 5000rpm 130PS @ 5000rpm 117PS @ 3750rpm Torque 200Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 230Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 300Nm @ 1500 - 2500rpm Manual 6-speed MT 6-speed MT 6-speed MT Automatic 6-speed TC 6-speed TC 6-speed AMT The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available with 3 engine options: two 1.2L turbo petrol engines and a 1.5L turbo diesel engine. One of the 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 110PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 130PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is also available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine churns out 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500 and 2500rpm. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed AMT automatic transmission. What Is The Mileage Or Fuel Efficiency Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | MILEAGE OR FUEL EFFICIENCY Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Manual FE 20.10kmpl 18.89kmpl 20.60kmpl Automatic FE 18.20kmpl 17.96kmpl 21.20kmpl The Mahindra XUV 3XOs lower tuned 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a mileage of 20.10kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.20kmpl with the 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a claimed mileage of 18.89kmpl with the manual transmission and 17.96kmpl with the TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine has a mileage of 20.60kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 21.20kmpl with the 6-speed AMT transmission. 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. tech.text: [{'url': 'https://ackodrive.com/car-guide/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-explained/', 'content': 'Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Moreover, with the ADRENOX Connect technology, you can control your cars features through your smartphone from the comfort of your home. It allows y', 'images': [{'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'alt_text': 'image_21_09398560b1.webp', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}, {'url': 'https://acko-cms.ackoassets.com/Mahindra_XUV_3_XO_1_50764da01b.png', 'alt_text': 'Mahindra', 'width': '740', 'height': '400', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.7}], 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-amc-Library/default/dw14bf6b46/X3XO/XUV3XOProductBrochure-01-07-24.pdf', 'content': "[error] 'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 195-196: character maps to <undefined>", 'rank': 2}, {'url': 'https://automotivemahindra.com/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-variants-explained/', 'content': 'Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO | Automotive Mahindra Skip to main content Sales:6309432323 Service:6309666592 Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search XUV 3XO Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO By admin May 30, 2024 December 30th, 2024 No Comments Home BLOG Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO Explore Top Features of Mahindra XUV 3XO All Variants Explained Bookings for the Mahindra XUV 3XO began on May 15 in India, while deliveries got initiated from May 26. Not only does the Compact SUV come with Everything You Want & More, but it also has a significantly updated look. Since the Mahindra XUV 300s powertrain configuration is the same as that of the small SUV, there are no changes to its technical specifications. The SUVs front profile appears more forceful thanks to its redesigned radiator grille, new projector headlights, and inverted LED daytime running lights. The Hyundai Venue, Maruti Suzuki Brezza, and Tata Nexon are among the best-selling cars in the segment that the car will go up against. Pay a minimum of Rs 21,000* at the Automotive showrooms like Mahindra 3XO Showroom in Hyderabad to book the compact SUV now. The fact that the official statistics show an astounding 50,000 BOOKINGS IN 60 MINUTES is exciting. Ex-showroom, the SUVs price ranges from Rs 7.48* Lakh to Rs 15.49* Lakh. Overview of Top Features This car is amazing with its 10.25-inch infotainment system and driver display, digital instrument cluster, ambient lighting, wireless charging, dual-zone climate control, Adrenox, ventilated front seats, and powered driver seats. It also has a 360-degree surround camera. Along with Apple CarPlay, a Type-C charging port, wireless Android Auto setup, and many other car connection features, it also has these features. Level-2 ADAS, panoramic sunroof category first introduced with the Mahindra 3XO. Also, theres a replacement of the XUV300 Variants with the labels MX and AX in 3XO. The major upgrades in Mahindra XUV 3XO are set to make the driving experience, comfort, safety, and technology more advanced. Safety There are six airbags as standard on all models of car. It also has a rear disc brake, an ISOFIX anchor, and electronic stability control. A level 2 advanced driver assistance system is among the safety systems that are included with the top 3XO model. A 360-degree camera, hill-start assistance, blind spot monitoring, and an electronic parking brake with auto hold are among the other safety features. Talk to the expert staff of Automotive Mahindra Dealers Hyderabad to know more information on safety. Engine There are three different engine options available for the vehicle. A 1.5-liter diesel engine with 115 horsepower is produced. A 1.2-liter gasoline engine with turbocharging generates 110 horsepower, while another 1.2-liter engine with turbocharging generates 129 horsepower. Additionally, a 6-speed manual or automatic transmission is an option with this. The XUV 3XO boasts a wide variety of premium turbo engines designed for exhilarating performance and outstanding efficiency. In keeping with the brands tradition of delivering thrilling performance, the mStallion TGDi and Turbo Diesel engines produce best-in-class power and torque of 96 kW (130 PS) & 230 Nm and 85.8 kW (117 PS) & 300 Nm, respectively. The mStallion TGDi can accelerate from 0 to 60 km/h in 4.5 seconds and has a segment-best fuel efficiency of 20.1 km/l* with a manual gearbox. A 6-speed AISIN 3rd Gen Automatic Transmission, which is well-known for its dependability and durability, powers the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This is proved by the fact that it was effectively adopted by the XUV 700, which also utilizes a transmission from the same family. Together with seamless gear changes, the transmission is tuned to deliver exceptional fuel economy and a fun to drive experience. US 18000 Dollar EU 16380 Euro UK 14040 Pound Australia 27000 Dollar Canada 24120 Dollar India 1491660 Rupee Indonesia 279684000 Rupiah Philippines 1004580 Peso Nigeria 18000 Naira Russia 1583280 Ruble Pakistan 4983300 Rupee Saudi Arabia 67500 Riyal The 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO: Redefining the Future of Automotive Innovation In the fast-paced world of automotive engineering, Mahindra has once again raised the bar with the launch of its highly anticipated 2026 XUV 3XO. Blending cutting-edge technology with sleek design, this latest addition to the XUV series promises to revolutionize the driving experience for consumers worldwide. Design Elegance: The 2026 XUV 3XO boasts a futuristic exterior design that seamlessly merges aerodynamics with aesthetic appeal. With its bold lines, aggressive stance, and distinctive grille, the XUV 3XO commands attention on the road. LED headlights and taillights further enhance its modern look, while sleek contours contribute to improved fuel efficiency. Performance Prowess: Under the hood, the XUV 3XO is powered by an advanced hybrid powertrain that delivers impressive performance while minimizing environmental impact. Equipped with state-of-the-art electric motors and a responsive combustion engine, this crossover SUV offers exhilarating acceleration and dynamic handling, making every journey a thrill. Tech-Savvy Features: Step inside the cabin, and youll find yourself immersed in a world of innovation. The 2026 XUV 3XO comes loaded with an array of cutting-edge features designed to enhance comfort, convenience, and connectivity. From a high-definition touchscreen infotainment system to advanced driver-assistance technologies, every aspect of the driving experience has been meticulously crafted to cater to the needs of modern motorists. Safety First: Mahindra prioritizes safety, and the XUV 3XO is no exception. Equipped with an array of intelligent safety features such as adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and autonomous emergency braking, this crossover SUV provides peace of mind for both drivers and passengers alike. Additionally, a robust chassis and advanced airbag system ensure maximum protection in the event of a collision. Sustainability Focus: In an era where environmental conservation is paramount, the 2026 XUV 3XO leads the charge towards a greener future. With its hybrid powertrain and eco-friendly materials, this vehicle minimizes carbon emissions without compromising performance. Mahindras commitment to sustainability is evident in every aspect of the XUV 3XO, from its efficient engineering to its recyclable components. Conclusion: With the launch of the 2026 XUV 3XO, Mahindra once again demonstrates its unwavering dedication to innovation, performance, and sustainability. This crossover SUV represents the pinnacle of automotive engineering, setting new standards for excellence in the industry. Whether navigating city streets or embarking on off-road adventures, the XUV 3XO delivers an unparalleled driving experience that is sure to leave a lasting impression. 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications SPECIFICATIONS Pros Cons The Latest Cars on Cars2wd.com 2026 Toyota Baby FJ Cruiser 2026 Mitsubishi Pajero Mini 2026 Toyota TerraMax Camper Van 2026 Toyota 44 Camper Motorhome 2026 Pontiac Firebird Trans Am 2026 Toyota Hard', 'images': [{'url': 'https://cars2wd.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2026-Mahindra-XUV-3XO--600x400.jpg', 'alt_text': '2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO', 'width': '600', 'height': '400', 'class': 'aps-image-zoom', 'confidence': 0.9999999999999999}], 'rank': 4}, {'url': 'https://namastecar.com/2024/05/02/mahindra-xuv-3xo-review-a-sophisticated-blend-of-style-comfort-and-cutting-edge-technology/', 'content': 'Mahindra XUV 3XO Review: A Sophisticated Blend of Style, Comfort, and Cutting-Edge Technology - NamasteCar NamasteCar Reviews News Brands Cars Pictures Videos Strive for tech news and insights? Dimensions and Exterior Features : Exterior highlights include LED fog lamps, a piano black grille, Bi-LED projector headlamps with LED DRLs, and Infinity LED tail lamps. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment.
