Team Spinny Last updated 3 months ago As we all know the safety of a vehicle is one of the most important attributes in current times. People want a car that not only delivers on performance and efficiency but also stands out with its safety features. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is making headlines as one of the safest small SUVs in India. This beast by Mahindra has gained attention for its advanced features and design, which are further complemented with its safety features. It is an upgraded version of the Mahindra XUV300 that packs a strong punch. The starting price of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is Rs. 7.99 lakh (ex-showroom), making it an affordable yet well-equipped compact SUV. The safety of a vehicle is best measured through crash test ratings, and Mahindra has ensured that the XUV 3XO meets high standards. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating proves that it is one of the safest cars in its segment. Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP Safety Rating Checking a cars NCAP rating is one of the best ways to understand how safe it is. NCAP, or the New Car Assessment Program, conducts crash tests to see how well a vehicle can protect its occupants in an accident. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has performed well in its NCAP tests. It was tested under Bharat NCAP (BNCAP), which is Indias version of the global safety program. The Mahindra XUV 3XO received a 5-star safety rating in Bharat NCAP, meaning it provides excellent protection for both adults and children. Lets look at the details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP rating. Mahindra XUV 3XO Adult Occupant Protection Rating During the adult occupants rating in the NCAP test, the Mahindra XUV 3XO NCAP ratings were pretty impressive. The vehicle scored the maximum possible score of 29.36 out of 32 points . Some crucial factors that contributed to this high rating include: Stable Bodyshell: The structure of the Mahindra XUV 3XO has been found to be stable, meaning it can withstand additional impact without collapsing. Frontal Impact Protection: The cars front airbags and seatbelt pre-tensioners helped reduce injuries to the head, neck, and chest. Side Impact Protection: The side structure of the XUV 3XO, along with additional side and curtain airbags, ensured safety in side collisions. Electronic Stability Control (ESC): This system helps maintain control of the car during sudden turns or slippery conditions, reducing the chances of rollovers. All-Wheel Disc Brakes: The XUV 3XO offers disc brakes on all four wheels, providing better braking efficiency. Mahindra XUV 3XO Child Occupant Protection Rating Child safety is another critical aspect of a cars overall safety rating. The Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating for child occupants is 43 out of 49 points , which is an excellent score. This means the car provides solid protection for children in case of an accident. Some of the key factors that contributed to this rating include: ISOFIX Child Seat Anchors: These allow parents to securely install child safety seats, reducing the risk of movement in case of impact. Dynamic Score: The XUV 3XO performed well in crash tests with child dummies,', 'images': [{'url': 'https://www.spinny.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Spinny-2024-Hyundai-Creta-800x450.webp', 'alt_text': 'Hyundai Creta', 'width': '800', 'height': '450', 'class': 'attachment-medium size-medium wp-image-519796 not-transparent', 'loading': 'lazy', 'confidence': 0.8999999999999999}], 'rank': 5}, {'url': 'https://businessnewstips.com/mahindra-xuv-3xos-adas-features-explained/', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 6}, {'url': 'https://automotivemahindra.com/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-variants-explained/', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 7}, {'url': 'https://www.91wheels.com/faqs/how-many-airbags-are-there-in-mahindra-xuv-3xo/283904', 'content': '[not extracted] Content limit reached', 'rank': 8}]

Login OTP has been sent to Resend OTP Submit OTP Select City We need your city to customize your experience Select City V3Cars Reviews Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine Specifications, Mileage, Power, Torque May 1, 2024, 11:58 AM IST By Prathu Sharma 0 This article will give you a perspective of the engine specs like, displacement, power, torque, mileage and transmission details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO petrol and diesel engines. Considering the body style, size and price range of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it competes with the following cars: Kia Sonet Maruti Suzuki Fronx Renault Kiger NIssan Magnite Hyundai Venue Tata Nexon What Are The Engine Specs Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | ENGINE SPECS Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Displacement 1197cc 1197cc 1497cc Cylinder 3 3 4 Power 110PS @ 5000rpm 130PS @ 5000rpm 117PS @ 3750rpm Torque 200Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 230Nm @ 1500 - 3750rpm 300Nm @ 1500 - 2500rpm Manual 6-speed MT 6-speed MT 6-speed MT Automatic 6-speed TC 6-speed TC 6-speed AMT The Mahindra XUV 3XO is available with 3 engine options: two 1.2L turbo petrol engines and a 1.5L turbo diesel engine. One of the 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 110PS of power at 5000rpm and 200Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine makes 130PS of power at 5000rpm and 230Nm of torque between 1500 and 3750rpm. This engine is also available with a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine churns out 117PS of power at 3750rpm and 300Nm of torque between 1500 and 2500rpm. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine gets a 6-speed MT and a 6-speed AMT automatic transmission. What Is The Mileage Or Fuel Efficiency Of Mahindra XUV 3XO? MAHINDRA XUV 3XO | MILEAGE OR FUEL EFFICIENCY Engine 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.2L Turbo Petrol 1.5L Turbo Diesel Manual FE 20.10kmpl 18.89kmpl 20.60kmpl Automatic FE 18.20kmpl 17.96kmpl 21.20kmpl The Mahindra XUV 3XOs lower tuned 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a mileage of 20.10kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 18.20kmpl with the 6-speed TC automatic transmission. The other 1.2L turbo petrol engine has a claimed mileage of 18.89kmpl with the manual transmission and 17.96kmpl with the TC automatic transmission. The 1.5L turbo diesel engine has a mileage of 20.60kmpl with the 6-speed MT and 21.20kmpl with the 6-speed AMT transmission. 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV.
